dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: Va tot bé?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: No! Ha aparegut alguna mena d’interferència...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Alguna cosa no va bé! Ens estavellarem!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Evacuació!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Tothom fora de la nau!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Això no hauria de passar!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Bufa! Quina por!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: Almenys ens n’hem pogut escapar tots, oi, nois?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Per què la nau només m’ha teletransportat aquí a mi?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que tothom n’hagi|sortit il·lès...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: Violeta! Ets tu?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Estàs bé!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Ha passat alguna cosa terrible amb el teletransportador de la nau!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que ha teletransportat tothom a llocs aleatoris! Podrien ser en qualsevol lloc!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Jo sóc a la nau. Està molt malmesa,|però encara està sencera!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Tu on ets, cap?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: En alguna mena d’estació espacial...|Sembla força moderna...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Sembla que en aquesta dimensió hi ha alguna mena d’interferència...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Ara t’enviaré les coordenades de la nau.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: No et puc teletransportar fins aquí, però...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Si aconsegueixes trobar tu un teletransportador en algun lloc a prop d’on ets, hauries de poder-te teletransportar fins a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Entesos! Miraré de trobar-ne un!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Bona sort, cap!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Jo continuaré mirant de contactar amb la resta de la tripulació...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Què deu ser, aquella cosa?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Suposo que no la necessito, però potser estaria bé dur-la a la nau per a estudiar-la...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Oh! Una altra cosa brillant d’aquelles!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Suposo que no la necessito, però potser estaria bé dur-la a la nau per a estudiar-la...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Un teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Amb això puc tornar a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: I doncs, doctora... Tens cap idea de què ha fet que ens estavelléssim?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Hi ha alguna mena de senyal estrany|que provoca interferències als nostres sistemes...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ha fet que la nau perdés la posició quàntica i ens ha endinsat en aquesta dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Però em sembla que hauríem de poder reparar la nau i sortir d’aquí...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: Sempre que trobem la resta de la tripulació, és clar...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: No en sabem absolutament res, d’aquest lloc...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: Els nostres amics podrien ser en qualsevol racó. I podrien estar perduts o en perill!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Es poden teletransportar fins aquí?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Si no troben cap manera de comunicar-se amb nosaltres, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: No rebem cap senyal seu i no es poden teletransportar fins aquí si no saben on és la nau...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: I què fem, doncs?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Hem de trobar-los! Surt a la dimensió i mira de descobrir on han anat a parar...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: D’acord! Per on comencem?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Bé, jo he mirat de localitzar-los amb els escàners de la nau!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: No ha funcionat, però he descobert una cosa...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Aquests punts que apareixen a l’escaneig tenen patrons d’alta energia!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: És força probable que siguin teletransportadors, i això vol dir que estan construïts al costat de coses importants...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Poden ser un molt bon lloc on començar a investigar.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: D’acord! Doncs me’n vaig a mirar què hi trobo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Si necessites ajuda, seré aquí!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Si necessites ajuda, seré aquí!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Tot això m’aclapara una mica, doctora.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Per on començo?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Recorda que pots prémer Retorn per a veure on ets del mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Recorda que pots prémer {b_map} per a veure on ets del mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Cerca zones on pugui haver-hi altres tripulants...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Si et perds, pots tornar a la nau a partir de qualsevol teletransportador.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: I no pateixis! Segur que trobarem tothom!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Tot anirà bé!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Estàs bé, cap?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Em preocupa la Victòria, doctora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Em preocupa en Vitel·lí, doctora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Em preocupa en Verdet, doctora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Em preocupa en Vermelló, doctora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Em preocupes tu, doctora!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Ah, no pateixis, segur que apareixerà!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Té, una piruleta!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Això sembla un bon lloc on emmagatzemar les coses que trobi allà fora...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: La Victòria gaudeix estudiant les coses interessants que trobem durant les nostres aventures!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Això sembla un bon lloc on emmagatzemar aquelles coses brillants...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: La Victòria gaudeix estudiant les coses interessants que trobem durant les nostres aventures!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que estigui bé...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Estava molt preocupat!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Enginyer en cap Verdet! Estàs bé!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: He mirat de sortir d’aquí, però no deixo de fer voltes...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Vinc de la nau. Sóc aquí per a teletransportar-t’hi.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: La resta estan bé? I la Violeta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Està bé. És a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Ah, fantàstic! Som-hi, doncs!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no! Cap! Tu tampoc no pots sortir d’aquí?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: No pateixis, he vingut|a rescatar-te!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Deixa’m explicar-t’ho tot...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Què? No he entès res de res!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Ah... Bé, doncs no pateixis.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Segueix-me! Tot anirà bé!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Ai... Segur?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: D’acord, doncs!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: M’alegro molt de veure’t! Pensava que era l’únic que s’havia escapat de la nau...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermelló! Sabia que estaries bé!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: I doncs, quina és la situació?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: És clar! D’acord, doncs millor que tornem.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Hi ha un teletransportador a la sala del costat.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Ah, Viridis! Tu també vas sortir de la nau sense fer-te mal, oi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: M’alegro de veure que estàs bé, professor!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: La nau està bé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Està força malmesa, però la Violeta|treballa per a reparar-la.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: La teva ajuda ens vindria molt bé...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Ah, és clar!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Les interferències del rerefons d’aquesta dimensió van impedir que la nau trobés un teletransportador abans que ens estavelléssim!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: Per això hem acabat teletransportats|a diferents llocs!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: Eh... És clar, té sentit!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Tornem a la nau, doncs!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Darrere teu, cap!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Buàààà!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Cap! Estàs bé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Estic bé... Però això...|no és la nau...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: On som?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Buàààà!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Alguna cosa no ha anat bé... Hem de cercar un camí de tornada!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Segueix-me! T’ajudaré!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Promet-me que no te n’aniràs sense mi!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: T’ho prometo! No pateixis!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Va tot bé allà baix, doctora?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Me’n vull anar a casa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: On som? Com se suposa que hi hem arribat?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Doncs... la Violeta deia que les interferències de la dimensió on ens hem estavellat causaven problemes amb els teletransportadors...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Suposo que alguna cosa ha anat malament...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Però si trobem un altre teletransportador, suposo que podrem tornar a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Cap! Espera’m!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: No em deixis enrere!|No vull ser cap càrrega!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Tinc por!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Ah... No pateixis, Victòria, tindré cura de tu!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: No sortirem mai d’aquí, oi que no?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: N... no ho sé...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: No sé on som ni com n’hem de sortir...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Acabarem perduts per sempre més!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Au, va... Les coses no estan tan malament.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Tinc la sensació que som a prop de casa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: No podem ser gaire lluny d’un altre teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Espero que tinguis raó, cap...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Tenies raó! Hi ha un teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Buf! Ja patia, la veritat... Pensava que no en trobaríem mai cap.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Què? De debò?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: En fi, tornem a la nau.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Eh? Això no és la nau...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Cap! Què passa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: N... no ho sé!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: On som?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Caram, això no va bé...|El teletransportador devia tenir algun problema!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: D’acord... Mantinguem la calma!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Cerquem un altre teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Anem cap allà!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Després de tu, cap!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Així, la Violeta és a la nau? De debò que està bé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: I tant! M’ha ajudat a trobar|el camí de tornada!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Ah, uf! Patia per ella.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Cap, tinc un secret...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: M’agrada molt la Violeta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: De debò?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Promet-me que no li ho diràs!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Va tot bé?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Diria que sí! Espero que trobem|un camí cap a la nau...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Daixò... Pel que fa a la Violeta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Eh... Sí?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Tens cap consell?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Doncs... hauries de...|ser tu mateix!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Gràcies, cap!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: I què, creus que podràs|reparar la nau?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Depèn de com estigui de malament...|Però penso que sí!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: No és tan difícil, en realitat. El disseny bàsic del motor de salt dimensional és força simple,|i si aconseguim que això funcioni, no hauríem de tenir problemes per a arribar a casa.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Ah! Genial!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Per fi! Un teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Ja començava a pensar que no en trobaríem cap...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Tornem a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Bufa! On som?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Això... no va bé... El teletransportador devia tenir algun problema!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Què hi farem... Ja ho investigarem quan tornem a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Som-hi, a explorar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Molt bé!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Rebut, cap!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Ei, Viridis... Com és que ens vam estavellar, exactament?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Ah, doncs no ho sé del cert... Només sé que per les interferències...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: O per alguna cosa científica així... No és el meu fort, aquest tema.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Bé, i creus que podrem reparar la nau i tornar a casa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: És clar! Tot anirà bé!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Ep! Va tot bé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Crec que sí! Però tinc moltes ganes de tornar a la nau...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Ens en sortirem! Si aconseguim trobar un teletransportador en algun lloc, hauríem de poder tornar-hi!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Falta gaire?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Ens hi estem acostant, em sembla...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: On devem ser, a tot això?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: No sé per què, però aquest lloc sembla diferent de la dimensió on ens vam estavellar...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: No sé... Però ara ja devem ser a prop d’un teletransportador...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Ja hi som!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ho veus? T’ho he dit! Vinga, tornem a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Que interessant...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Cap! Has estat mai aquí?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Què? On som?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que alguna cosa ha desviat la transmissió del teletransportador! Aquest lloc és nou...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Hauríem de mirar de trobar un teletransportador i tornar a la nau...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Darrere teu, cap!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: Què en penses, de|tot això, professor?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Suposo que aquesta dimensió té|alguna cosa a veure amb les interferències que han causat que ens estavelléssim!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Potser en trobarem la causa aquí?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Ah, ostres! De debò?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Bé, només és una suposició. Necessito tornar a la nau abans de poder fer cap experiment real...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Què és, això?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: Què és, això?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: Aquesta cosa grossa... amb una C! Què deu fer?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Eh... No sé com respondre a la teva qüestió...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Segurament és millor que fem veure que no existeix.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: Ens la podríem emportar a la nau i estudiar-la!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: No hi hauríem de pensar pas gaire... Vinga, som-hi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Saps? Hi ha una cosa molt estranya en aquesta dimensió...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Què vols dir?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: No ens hauríem de poder moure entre dimensions amb un teletransportador normal...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Potser no és una dimensió com a tal?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: Potser és alguna mena de dimensió polar? Alguna cosa creada artificialment per algun motiu...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Em moro de ganes de tornar a la nau. Hi he de fer un munt d’experiments!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Hi deu haver alguna altra cosa d’aquesta dimensió que pagui la pena d’explorar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Potser... Però segurament només ens hauríem de centrar a trobar la resta de la tripulació, ara mateix...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!
dialogue.translation: Per fi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Tornem a la nau!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Una altra vegada no!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Victòria? On ets?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Resisteix! Et salvaré!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdet? On ets?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Resisteix! Et salvaré!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermelló? On ets?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Resisteix! Et salvaré!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitel·lí? On ets?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Resisteix! Et salvaré!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que em posaré malalta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Quin mareig...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Buf! Estàs bé!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Quin mareig...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Una altra vegada! Tornem-hi!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Quin mareig...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Ha estat interessant, oi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Quin mareig...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Espero que en Verdet estigui bé...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Si aconseguissis trobar-lo, seria de gran ajuda a l’hora|de reparar la nau!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: L’enginyer en cap Verdet és valent i intel·ligent alhora!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Tornes a ser aquí, cap!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que la Victòria està força contenta de tornar a ser a la nau.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: No li agrada gens anar d’aventures. S’enyora molt fàcilment!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: En Vermelló t’envia salutacions!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar la resta de la tripulació!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar la Victòria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar en Vitel·lí!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar en Verdet!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar en Vermelló!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Té moltes ganes d’ajudar-te|a trobar-te!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Has trobat en Verdet!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Moltes gràcies!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: M’alegro que el professor Vitel·lí estigui bé!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Em volia fer un munt de qüestions sobre aquesta dimensió.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Ja s’ha posat a investigar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doctora, ha passat una cosa estranya quan ens hem teletransportat a la nau...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ens hem perdut en una altra dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Potser aquella dimensió té alguna cosa a veure amb les interferències que han causat que ens estavelléssim aquí?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Ho investigaré...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Doctora, doctora! Ha tornat a passar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: El teletransportador ens ha portat a aquella dimensió estranya...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Sens dubte, passa alguna cosa estranya...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Tant de bo trobéssim l’origen de les interferències!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doctora, quan ens teletransportem a la nau, passen coses estranyes...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Sempre ens acaba portant a una altra dimensió estranya!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ostres, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Potser aquella dimensió té alguna cosa a veure amb les interferències que han causat que ens estavelléssim aquí?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Sens dubte, passa alguna cosa estranya...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Tant de bo trobéssim l’origen de les interferències!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Ei, cap! Ara que has desactivat l’origen de les interferències, podem teletransportar tothom a la nau instantàniament, si cal!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Si en algun moment vols tornar a la nau, selecciona la nova opció NAU al menú!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Sóc enginyer!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que podré aconseguir que la nau es torni a moure, però em costarà una bona estona...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: La Victòria parlava d’un laboratori o una cosa així? Potser hi ha trobat alguna cosa, allà baix?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: En Vermelló ha tornat! Visca!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: El professor em volia fer un munt de qüestions sobre aquesta dimensió...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Però encara no en sabem gaire cosa.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Fins que no descobrim què causa les interferències, no podrem anar enlloc.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: M’alegro molt que la Violeta estigui bé!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: L’altra dimensió on havíem anat a parar deu estar relacionada amb aquesta d’alguna manera...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: L’antena està trencada! Això costarà molt de reparar...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Sembla com si ens haguéssim teletransportat enmig de roca sòlida en estavellar-nos!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Costarà separar-nos-en...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: La nau ja està tota reparada. Podem anar-nos-en en un tres i no res!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: No pateixis!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Trobarem una manera de sortir d’aquí!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que la Victòria estigui bé...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: No li agraden gaire les sorpreses...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: No sé pas com farem que la nau torni a funcionar!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: L’enginyer en cap Verdet sabria què fer...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Què devia fer que la nau s’estavellés aquí?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: És una llàstima que el professor no hi sigui, eh? Segur que ell ho esbrinaria!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: És genial tornar a ser aquí!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Em moro de ganes d’ajudar-te a trobar la resta de tripulants!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Serà com als vells temps, oi, cap?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: És genial que la Victòria torni a ser amb nosaltres.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Sembla molt feliç de poder tornar a treballar al seu laboratori!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Em sembla que he vist en Verdet treballant a la part exterior de la nau!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Has trobat el professor Vitel·lí! Molt bé!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Ara resoldre el tema de les interferències serà bufar i fer ampolles!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Aquella altra dimensió era ben estranya, eh?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Per què el teletransportador ens va enviar allà?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Iep, cap!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Aquest camí sembla una mica perillós...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: T’estic ajudant!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ei, cap!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: En aquesta zona he trobat una cosa interessant: les mateixes formes derivades d’un teletransport que vaig veure quan vaig aterrar!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Hi ha d’haver algú de la nau a prop...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Aquesta dimensió és força emocionant, oi?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Què hi trobarem?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: Hi ha cap senyal del professor Vitel·lí?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Em sap greu, però de moment, no...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que estigui bé...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Moltes gràcies per salvar-me, cap!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: M’alegro molt de tornar a ser aquí!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Aquell laboratori era fosc i feia por! No m’agradava gens...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: En Vitel·lí torna a ser aquí? Sabia que el trobaries!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Tot i que he d’admetre que tenia molta por que no el trobessis...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: O que li hagués passat|alguna cosa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Doctora Victòria... Que està bé!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Ah, perdona! És que pensava en què passaria si no ho estigués!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Gràcies, cap!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Has trobat en Vermelló! Genial!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Tant de bo no fos tan imprudent!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Sempre es fica en problemes...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: En Verdet està bé! La Violeta es posarà molt contenta!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Estic feliç!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Tot i que patia molt...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Per què el teletransportador ens ha enviat a aquella dimensió tan espantosa?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: Què ha passat?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: No ho sé, doctora...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Per què?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ei, cap!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Miraràs de trobar la resta d’aquestes coses brillants?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Ei, cap, he trobat això en aquell laboratori...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Tens cap idea de per a què serveix?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Em sap greu, però no ho sé!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Semblen importants, però...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Potser passarà alguna cosa si els trobem tots?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Mira en què he estat treballant!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Sembla que aquelles coses brillants tenen unes lectures d’energia estranyes!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Així que ho he analitzat...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Cap! Mira en què he estat treballant!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: He trobat això en aquell laboratori...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Tenia unes lectures d’energia estranyes...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Així que ho he analitzat...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: ...i n’he descobert més amb l’escàner de la nau!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Si t’és possible, potser estaria|bé trobar-ne la resta!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Però no et posis en perill, eh?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: ...però sembla que ja les has trobades totes en aquesta dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ah, sí? De debò?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Sí, molt ben fet! Segur que no ha estat fàcil!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: ...i estan relacionades. Són part d’una cosa més grossa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ah, sí? De debò?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Sí! Sembla que hi ha vint variacions de la signatura d’energia fonamental...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Un moment...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: Això vol dir que les has trobades totes?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Estic fent uns descobriments fascinants, cap!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Aquesta dimensió no és com les altres on hem estat, cap.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Aquest lloc és estrany, per algun motiu...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Cap, t’has adonat que aquesta dimensió sembla que sigui cíclica? Quan en surts per un costat, apareixes per l’altre.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Sí, és estrany...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Sembla com si aquesta dimensió tingués els mateixos problemes d’estabilitat que nosaltres!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Espero que no en siguem|els causants...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Què? Creus que podem ser-ho?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: No, no... És molt improbable, de fet...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Suposo que qui fos que vivia aquí experimentava amb maneres de fer que la dimensió no s’esfondrés.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Això explicaria per què les vores esdevenen cícliques...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Escolta, potser és això, el que causa les interferències?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: On deu haver anat, la gent que vivia aquí?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Em penso que no és cap coincidència que el teletransportador anés a parar a aquella dimensió...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Allà hi ha alguna cosa. Potser és el que causa les interferències que no ens permeten anar-nos-en...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: M’alegro que en Verdet estigui bé.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Ara que podem fer que la nau torni a funcionar, serà molt més fàcil trobar una manera de sortir d’aquí!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ah, has trobat la doctora Victòria? Excel·lent!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Li he de fer un munt de qüestions!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: En Vermelló diu que estava atrapat en una mena de túnel?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Sí, sembla que es repetia una vegada rere l’altra...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Interessant... Per què el devien construir?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: M’alegro de tornar a ser aquí!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Tinc molta feina pendent...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Suposo que és una mica perillós estar-nos aquí ara que la dimensió s’està esfondrant...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: Però és molt poc habitual trobar|un lloc tan interessant!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Potser hi trobarem les respostes als nostres propis problemes?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Cap! Feia temps que et volia donar això...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Professor! On ho has trobat?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Ah, era en aquella estació espacial.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: És una llàstima que no hi hagi la doctora Victòria. Li encanta estudiar aquesta mena de coses...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Tens cap idea de per a què serveixen?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: No! Però tenen unes lectures d’energia estranyes...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: ...així que he fet servir l’escàner de la nau per a trobar-ne més!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: Però... que no et distreguin de trobar la Victòria, d’acord?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que estigui bé...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Sembla que no en detecto|cap més a prop.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Potser ja les has trobades totes?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Que bé que tornis a ser aquí!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Daixò... Cap Viridis, on ets?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: Que hi ha algú?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
*** GENERADOR D’ESTABILITAT *** DIMENSIONAL
[ Actualment s’està generant ] Estabilitat màxima
[ Estat ] Activat
A PUNT _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Ahà! Això deu ser el que causa les interferències!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Potser el podria apagar?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: ADVERTIMENT: Si desactiveu el generador d’estabilitat dimensional, podeu generar inestabilitat!|Segur que voleu fer això?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Sí!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
Ara de debò! La dimensió sencera es podria esfondrar! Penseu-hi durant uns minuts!
Segur que voleu fer això?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Sí!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= ADVERTIMENT =-
ESTABILITZADOR DIMENSIONAL DESCONNECTAT

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Hauria d’aparèixer en qualsevol moment...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Estàs bé!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Sabia que te’n sortiries!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Patíem molt per si no tornaves...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: ...però quan has desactivat l’origen de les interferències...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: ...hem pogut localitzar-te amb els escàners de la nau...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: ...i teletransportar-te de nou a bord!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Quina sort!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Gràcies, nois!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: ...sembla que aquesta dimensió s’està començant a desestabilitzar, igual que la nostra...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: Ens hi podem estar i explorar una mica més, però...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: ...tard o d’hora, s’esfondrarà per complet.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: No sabem exactament quant de temps tenim. Però la nau està reparada, així que...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: ...tan bon punt estiguem llestos,|podrem tornar a casa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Què hi ha, cap?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Trobem una manera de salvar aquesta dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: I una manera de salvar la nostra, alhora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: Segur que la resposta és allà fora, en algun lloc!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Bufa! Les has trobades totes!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: De debò? Fantàstic!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Faré alguns experiments i miraré de descobrir per a què serveixen...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Això... no ha sonat gaire bé...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Una altra vegada no!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Espereu! S’ha aturat!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Aquí és on desàvem les coses brillants aquelles, oi? Què ha passat?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Hi estàvem jugant, i...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: ...han explotat de sobte!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Però mireu què han fet! És un teletransportador?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Això sembla, però...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: No he vist mai un teletransportador així...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Ho hauríem d’investigar!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Què en penses, cap?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: Hauríem d’investigar on porta?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no! Estem atrapats!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: Ai, mare...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Hum... Com ens en podem sortir?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: FUSIÓ!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: O bé... també hauríem pogut teletransportar-nos a la nau...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Ostres! Què és això?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Sembla un altre laboratori!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Donem-hi un cop d’ull!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Mira quanta recerca! Això ens serà de gran ajuda quan tornem a casa!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Per què devien abandonar aquesta dimensió? Eren molt a prop de descobrir com reparar-la...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: Potser la podem reparar en nom seu? Potser tornaran?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Aquest laboratori és increïble! Els científics que hi treballaven sabien moltes més coses de la tecnologia del teletransport que no pas nosaltres!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Cap! Has vist això?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Si ajuntem les seves investigacions i les nostres, potser podríem estabilitzar la nostra dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Estem salvats!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Mira què he trobat!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: És força difícil, només hi he durat uns deu segons...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= TOCADISCOS =-
Les cançons continuaran sonant fins que surtis de la nau.
Recull lluentons per a desblocar cançons noves!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 5 lluentons
Prement sempre endavant

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 8 lluentons
Positivitat en la força

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 10 lluentons
Presentació de VVVVVV

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 12 lluentons
Potencial per a qualsevol cosa

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 14 lluentons
Pressió dins l’olla

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 16 lluentons
Predestinació atzarosa

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 18 lluentons
Popurri popular

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
SEGÜENT PISTA A DESBLOCAR: 20 lluentons
Pretensió impossible

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= DIARI PERSONAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Ja han evacuat gairebé tothom de l’estació espacial. La resta|ens n’anirem d’aquí a un parell de dies, quan hàgim acabat la recerca.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: ...tot s’acaba esfondrant, tard o d’hora. L’univers és així.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Potser el que afecta els nostres|teletransportadors és el generador|que vam instal·lar a la dimensió polar?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: No, segurament només és un error.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= DIARI PERSONAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Ha! Aquest no l’agafarà mai ningú.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: L’altre dia un cub gegant amb la paraula EVITA em va perseguir per una sala.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Aquestes mesures de seguretat són massa estrictes!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: L’única manera d’entrar al meu laboratori privat és amb un teletransportador.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: M’he assegurat que sigui difícil que personal no autoritzat hi obtingui accés.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: ...el nostre primer avenç va ser la creació del pla d’inversió, que crea una dimensió mirall més enllà d’un horitzó d’esdeveniments|concret...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ...sols amb una petita modificació dels paràmetres normals, vam poder estabilitzar un túnel infinit!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ...l’últim pas a l’hora de crear l’estabilitzador dimensional va ser crear un bucle de retroalimentació...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: ...malgrat els nostres esforços, l’estabilitzador dimensional no funcionarà eternament. En algun moment, s’esfondrarà...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Eh? Aquestes coordenades no són ni tan sols en aquesta dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= DIARI PERSONAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: ...he hagut de segellar l’accés a la major part de la recerca. Qui sap què podria passar si caigués en les mans equivocades...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= NOTES DE RECERCA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ...l’accés al centre de control encara és possible a través dels filtres atmosfèrics principals...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ...resulta que la clau per a estabilitzar aquesta dimensió era crear una força equilibradora fora de la dimensió!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Tot i que això sembla només una solució temporal, com a molt.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: He estat treballant en una cosa més permanent, però sembla que ja serà massa tard...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?ERROR DE SINTAXI

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Ara que la nau ja està reparada, ens en podem anar quan vulguem!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Però tots hem estat d’acord a continuar explorant aquesta dimensió.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Qui sap què hi trobarem!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= RÀDIO DE LA NAU =-
[ Estat ] S’està transmetent

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= ADVERTIMENT =-
El supergravitró només té finalitats d’entreteniment.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Si algú el fa servir per a finalitats educatives, és|possible que l’enviem al racó de pensar.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= DSS SOULEYE =-
Controls de navegació de la nau

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Error! Error! No és possible aïllar les coordenades dimensionals! S’han detectat interferències!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: Oh, això ja ho havia trobat...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Desactiva la invencibilitat i/o l’alentiment abans d’entrar al supergravitró.
